attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Limit by law conributions to council employees pension fund to 2 1/2% of 
annual council income,   Raise retiring age
to 65 in line with the private sector.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
